018package org.tquadrat.foundation.svg.type;
019
020import static java.util.Arrays.stream;
021import static java.util.Locale.ROOT;
022import static java.util.stream.Collectors.joining;
023import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.INTERNAL;
024import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.requireNonNullArgument;
025import static org.tquadrat.foundation.util.StringUtils.format;
026
027import org.apiguardian.api.API;
028import org.tquadrat.foundation.annotation.ClassVersion;
029
030/**
031 *  The abstract base class for SVG type class, providing some helper methods.
032 *
033 *  @extauthor Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
034 *  @version $Id: ValueBase.java 820 2020-12-29 20:34:22Z tquadrat $
035 *  @since 0.0.5
036 *
037 *  @UMLGraph.link
038 */
039@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: ValueBase.java 820 2020-12-29 20:34:22Z tquadrat $" )
040@API( status = INTERNAL, since = "0.0.5" )
041abstract sealed class ValueBase
042    permits SVGPaint, SVGPathElement, SVGTransform
043{
044        /*--------------*\
045    ====** Constructors **=====================================================
046        \*--------------*/
047    /**
048     *  Creates a new {@code ValueBase} instance.
049     */
050    protected ValueBase() { /* Just exists */ }
051
052        /*---------*\
053    ====** Methods **==========================================================
054        \*---------*/
055    /**
056     *  Converts a list of {@code double} values to a single String.
057     *
058     *  @param  separator   The separator.
059     *  @param  values  The {@code double} values.
060     *  @return The String.
061     */
062    protected static final String doubleToString( final char separator, final double... values )
063    {
064        final var retValue = stream( requireNonNullArgument( values, "values" ) )
065            .mapToObj( ValueBase::formatDouble  )
066            .collect( joining( Character.toString( separator ) ) );
067
068        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
069        return retValue;
070    }   //  doubleToString()
071
072    /**
073     *  {@inheritDoc}
074     */
075    @Override
076    public abstract boolean equals( Object obj );
077
078    /**
079     *  Converts a {@code double} to a String.
080     *
081     *  @param  value   The {@code double} type.
082     *  @return The string.
083     */
084    protected static final String formatDouble( final double value ) { return format( ROOT, "%1.3f", value ); }
085
086    /**
087     *  {@inheritDoc}
088     */
089    @Override
090    public abstract int hashCode();
091
092    /**
093     *  Converts a list of {@code long} values to a single String.
094     *
095     *  @param  separator   The separator.
096     *  @param  values  The {@code long} values.
097     *  @return The String.
098     */
099    protected static final String longToString( final char separator, final long... values )
100    {
101        final var retValue = stream( requireNonNullArgument( values, "values" ) )
102            .mapToObj( Long::toString )
103            .collect( joining( Character.toString( separator ) ) );
104
105        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
106        return retValue;
107    }   //  longToString()
108
109    /**
110     *  {@inheritDoc}
111     */
112    @Override
113    public abstract String toString();
114}
115//  class ValueBase
116
117/*
118 *  End of File
119 */
